name: Achievement Manager
short_description:
This simple application enables you to keep track of your life plans. 

You create a hierarchical list of things you want to achieve in life and you update your progress with comments and how far you've come on each element.

You can be detailed or you can choose to work with larger goals. The program enables you to start off simple and then create layers of detail at a later stage.

Update:This project has been on freeze for some period of time. The state is beta (at best) but I'm hoping to update the application somewhere during the next 6 months.
summary: This simple application enables you to keep track of your life plans.
